name: Peter Love Prototypes
description:
Path Racer

Create a path and race your friend in this two player racing game.

Alone in Space

A lone astronaut lost in space. Make your way to the teleporter to get back home

Stop and Go

Using colour tracking, use green and red colours to make the car stop and go. Stop on target and break through speed points on your way to the finish.

The Changing of Seasons

An aesthetic experience taking you through the changing of seasons.

**Note**

These games were designed to run in widescreen resolutions (16:9) such as 1920 x 1080 and 1280 x 720.
